Name: Pizza Death
About the game: Grab a slice of this fast-paced, pixel art, top-down shooter.. Pizza Death! You play as Dougie, a young delivery boy just trying to survive your shift at work, under the watchful eye of your evil boss, Nonna Morte! If you fail to make a delivery on time, prepare to suffer her wrath!! Purchase new weapons, unlock studio album tracks, and navigate a treacherous world full of pizza-themed traps and monsters! Made by members of the Australian thrash band Pizza Death, the main soundtrack is a NES chiptune cover version of their entire debut album, Slice of Death!!!
